articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 6 Pro May Offer Lots Of Flexibility For Qualcomm’s Partners When Choosing Newer Or Older DRAM & Storage Standards To Save Costs - Wccftech
articles.description: A rumor claims that Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 6 Pro may give Qualcomm’s partners various DRAM and storage configurations to choose from
articles.content: Qualcomm is expected to adopt a slightly different flagship chipset launch strategy this year, with the company rumored to introduce two versions called the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 6 Pro and Snapdrago… [+2128 chars]
